shrimp.name: atan
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.rsl_code: #define tanxy_$(B) 1 #ifdef tanxy_UND $(value) = atan( $(A) ); #else $(value) = atan( $(A), $(B) ); #endif /* tanxy_$(B) */ #undef tanxy_$(B)
shrimp.usage: Returns the arc tangent in the [-PI/2,PI/2] range with one argument. With two arguments, returns the arc tangent of y/x in the [-PI,PI] range. The second argument defaults to "UND"(efined), so the single argument form is used by default.
